title: Make old client downloadable for some people
body: For some people the new client, they're not used to it, some people's bad laptops (like mine) can't even handle the new client, it crashes all the time for me and probably some other people too.  Some people just dislike the new client or just would rather have the old client, I'm not saying to bring back the old client obviously, but maybe, either let us download the old client and use it, or make this new client a little less graphical and laggy so at the very least, i can pick and ban my champs without the client crashing. I do love this new client, it looks very very beautiful in my opinion it just crashes a bunch for me.

replies.body:
Beta applications are prone to some bumps along the way, so I understand you wanting to play more on the Legacy client. The files for the Legacy client are still on everyone's PCs, you simply need to hit the *Launch Legacy* button at the login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

This will get you right back into the Legacy client. I hope this helped! Let me know if you have any questions.
